Zend_Gdata  
Gdata  
No 
No 

Description

Extends the default HTTP adapter to handle streams instead of discrete body strings.

Methods

write,

write( string   $method, Zend_Uri_Http   $uri, string   $http_ver = 1.1, array   $headers = array, string   $body, ) : string

Description

Send request to the remote server with streaming support.

$uri Zend_Uri_Http |
